After image has opened in browser, go to File - Save As.            Inner Canyon Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (341 k) » tif (5.1 MB) »           Island Peaks Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (336 k) » tif (4.6 MB) »           Tomichi Point Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (381 k) » tif (5 MB) »           Winter Storm Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (375 k) » tif (5.2 MB) »           Painted Wall Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (357 k) » tif (5.2 MB) »           Gunnison Point Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (342 k) » tif (5.4 MB) »           Near Tomichi Point Credit: NPS/Lisa Lynch jpeg (350 k) » tif (4.9 MB) »
title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Photos & Multimedia
